item.title: Product Video Specialist Needed for Finding and Editing Product Videos for Social Media Ads - Upwork
item.description:
Description:

We are seeking a skilled and detail-oriented Product Video Specialist to help enhance our advertising efforts on Meta (Facebook and Instagram) and Pinterest. This role involves searching for existing product videos related to the products in our current webshop inventory and editing these videos to create compelling advertisements.

Responsibilities:

• Video Research: Locate high-quality product videos from various sources, such as Amazon product reviews, YouTube, and other relevant platforms, that match the products in our webshop.
• Video Editing: Edit the sourced videos to create engaging and persuasive content suitable for Meta (Facebook and Instagram) and Pinterest ads. This includes adding appropriate captions, calls to action, and any necessary branding elements.
• Optimization: Ensure the final videos are optimized for social media, focusing on high engagement rates and conversion potential.
• Quality Assurance: Maintain a high standard of video quality and consistency across all ads.
• Reporting: Provide regular updates on the status of video searches and editing progress.

Requirements:

• Proven experience in video editing and familiarity with video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, Capcut etc.).
• Strong ability to find relevant and high-quality product videos from various sources.
• Knowledge of best practices for creating engaging social media ads.
• Attention to detail and a keen eye for quality.
• Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.
• Strong communication skills.

Preferred Qualifications:

• Experience with e-commerce products and advertising.
• Understanding of the Meta and Pinterest ad platforms.
• Creativity and a proactive approach to problem-solving.

Application Process:

Please provide the following in your application:

1. A brief cover letter detailing your relevant experience and why you are a good fit for this role.
2. Examples of previous video editing work, particularly any work related to product advertisements.
3. A sample process you would use to find and edit a product video for a social media ad. You can also use our website and demonstrate with a product (www.eavy.nl)
4. Your proposed rate and availability.

We are looking forward to working with a dedicated professional who can help us create compelling and effective product videos for our advertising campaigns.

Hourly Range: $4.00-$5.00
Posted On: June 22, 2024 09:09 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Facebook, Social Media Marketing, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial
Skills: Video Editing, Facebook, Social Media Marketing, Video Post-Editing, Video Commercial
Country: Netherlands
click to apply

item.title: Looking for Video Editor for Vlog - Upwork
item.description:
Hi all,

I am doing a road trip for July and want to make a series on it.

I am planning to do 14 videos for this project.

Vlog video will include cuts, subtitles for some footage, face blur some BGM.

I have one video ready to test out. Reach out to me for more info!

Hourly Range: $5.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 22, 2024 09:06 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing

item.title: Record short 1-2 minute Screen-casting videos - Upwork
item.description:
If you have a good microphone and screen recording software, this might be something for you!

What we are doing:
We are an online education company and we create educational tutorial videos on YouTube about online problems.

Requirements:
- Decent microphone
- Screen recording software (OBS)
- Proficiency in english
- Bonus: voice over experience

Tasks:
1. Video creation
You will be recording video tutorials to online problems. Topics about online games and mobile apps are most common. (e.g. "How To Copy And Paste on Bluestacks", "How To Change Emotes in Brawl Stars", "How To Make GIF Stickers on Whatsapp iPhone").
Most videos are typically between 1-3 minutes long, can be recorded in one go and therefore don't require any editing.

Note: In the beginning stages we will introduce you to our systems but after a while you will become more efficient, since you will get to know each step of the process and you'll finish the tasks even quicker.


Payment
The payment is per video. We are looking for dedicated freelancers that can provide 4-5 videos per day. (28-35 videos per week) Recording 5 videos takes around 30 minutes using our systems. The payment per video is $1.25, which equals to $35.00 (28 videos) - $43.75 (35 videos) per week.

Note: Videos don't need to be recorded on a daily basis, you could finish all the work in the first 2 days of the week and be free for the rest of the week while still getting paid as agreed.


Get started
If you are interested in working together, DM me a short video sample that includes your human voice over and we will take things from there! (video sample can be about anything: e.g. "How to create a folder on pc")

Best regards
The TresoDigital Team

Budget: $40
Posted On: June 22, 2024 08:50 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Explainer Video, Screencasting Video, Voice-Over, Voice Acting
Skills: Video Production, Explainer Video, Screencasting Video, Voice-Over, Voice Acting
Country: Austria
click to apply

item.title: Video creation and editing for social media & antiques business - Upwork
item.description:
Hello
I have been making a website with the aim of helping people who buy and sell antiques and vintage items.  They can search my site for their item and see how much it has sold for previously.

The website is approaching the final stages and I want to start advertising it on social media (mainly instagram but I will be using youtube in the future a lot).

I have made a long video (3 mins) explaining the site - perhaps this could be optimised and just made a bit better with your technical skills!

My main focus with this post is to create some reels that highlight some of the profits that could be made when using my site. If you are also able to help me to gain more followers - helping with advertising and reaching the right people that is a very welcome bonus.

The ideal candidate will be very patient with me whilst I try to explain the visions in my head to you! Ideally you would have some knowledge of buying and selling antiques or something transferable

Thanks for your time!

www.thehammerpricex.com

p.s my idea for the reels is to show pictures of items bought for one price and then what it sold for.  This will showcase quite large profits that can be made, but how we capture the audience's attention based on a couple of pictures is where I need you! :)

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 22, 2024 08:46 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Instagram, Social Media Content, Social Media Marketing, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Commercial
Skills: Instagram, Social Media Content, Social Media Marketing, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Commercial
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Animation or VFX Video Creator for YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
I need this type of animation videos

Video Link 1: https://www.youtube.com/shorts/EToEKLiGdUc

Video Link 2 :https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=osl8FCrEP5s

Video Link 3 :https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AXmIGIOb4Qg

Video Link 4 :https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ven2W085g1k

Video Link 5 :https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VoK5ArHI9WU

Video Link 6:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mXZ45yLpg14




We are looking for a skilled animation or VFX video creator to join our team and help us produce engaging content for our YouTube channel. The ideal candidate should have a strong portfolio showcasing their ability to create visually stunning animations and special effects.
  Responsibilities:
  - Collaborate with the team to conceptualize and storyboard video ideas
  - Create high-quality animations and VFX using industry-standard software
  - Meet project deadlines and deliver exceptional results
  - Stay updated with the latest trends and techniques in animation and VFX

  Requirements:
  - Proven experience as an animation or VFX video creator
  - Proficiency in software such as Adobe After Effects, Blender, or Maya
  - Strong understanding of storytelling and visual communication
  - Attention to detail and ability to bring creative ideas to life
  - Excellent time management and organizational skills

  If you are passionate about creating captivating animations and have a strong eye for detail, we would love to hear from you. Join our team and help us take our YouTube channel to the next level!

Budget: $300
Posted On: June 22, 2024 08:29 UTC
Category: Cartoons & Comics
Skills:Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Video Production, Motion Graphics, Adobe Premiere Pro, Animation, Video Commercial
Skills: Adobe After Effects, Video Editing, Video Production, Motion Graphics, Adobe Premiere Pro, Animation, Video Commercial
Country: India
click to apply
